item.title: Buy stock 'compounders' for the long-term and tune out any near-term noise, Trivariate Research says
item.description: The research firm highlighted nearly two dozen companies that are forecast to continue boosting gross margins in the quarters ahead.

item.title: This lithium stock is set for a sharp move higher after clearing a key level, according to the charts
item.description: Chart analyst David Keller looks at the technical backdrop for this name that's broken above its 200-day moving average.

item.title: Nvidia headed to $200 a share, says Josh Brown
item.description: Investors should focus on Nvidia's big boost in A.I. infrastructure spending, and not the "noise" around China, says Ritholtz Wealth Management CEO Jo...

item.title: Dan Ives on Nvidia: 'This is a stock going to $5 trillion'
item.description: Dan Ives spoke with CNBC's Frank Holland about Nvidia's results and derivative plays.

item.title: Bitcoin is now less of a wild ride so big investors will get more comfortable buying it, says JPMorgan
item.description: Bitcoin's volatility has collapsed from 60% at the start of 2025 to about 30%.
